description: view inside an auditorium with two mezzanine levels, with many clapping and cheering people; handmade signs hanging on mezzanine railings
inscription: verso in purple: \"Alianza Nacional\" the Falengists \"Last Hurrah\" in Spain, 13/6/77. #77-48 (long text block) / Photos by Leonard Freed/ MAGNUM / 5. (77-8-1/25a) hundreds of clapping supporters welcome their leader Blas / Pinar to a meeting of the falangist group the Fuerza Nueva in a Bilbao cinema.
markings: verso stamped in black: VINTAGE PRINT | verso stamped in black: © Leonard Freed-Magnum | verso stamped in blue: Billed / Sentralen / Merkl ? Byraets og fotografene navn ma oppgis.
title: Hundreds of clapping supporters wave flags and welcome their leader Blas Pindar to a meeting of the falangist group, the Fuerza Nueva in Bilbao cinema.
